dlselect.remote_pc_info_1: It looks like the torrent client is running on a separate computer.
dlselect.remote_pc_info_2: Please choose the containing folder of the uploaded files on the remote computer.
dlselect.remote_pc_info_3: If this is an error, simply click OK without making changes.

popups.new_version: A new version of GUU is available. Do you want to download it?
popups.new_project_confirm: Are you sure you want to start a new project?
popups.categories_fetch_login_error: You must be logged in to download the category list.
popups.client_not_running: Cannot communicate with the torrent client. Please make sure it is running and try again.
popups.client_wrong_credentials: Cannot communicate with the torrent client. Please enter the correct credentials and try again.
popups.restart_required: Please restart the program for the changes to take effect.
popups.upload_confirm: Are you sure you want to upload?
popups.upload_login_error: Please log in to Gaytor.rent before uploading.
popups.torrent_dl_already_exists: Torrent already exists in the download folder.
popups.torrent_dl_no_permission: You do not have permission to save the torrent in the selected download folder.
